commit.message:
openmp.c (match_oacc_clause_gang): Fix uninitialized variable.

	gcc/fortran/
	* openmp.c (match_oacc_clause_gang): Fix uninitialized variable.
	(gfc_resolve_oacc_declare): Fix comparision.
